name: Save the lumi's
description:
Navigate the lumi's, these aliens will follow the yellow lights you can trigger with your laser

Turn light pillars on and off to guide the aliens to the end safely and watch out for red glowing things that will kill you and your alien friends

Aliens are drawn to the yellow light pillars, use it to help navigate them

aim and then shoot your laser to turn on, or turn off lights. Reach the end of the level.

CONTROLS
Escape/start: menu(use mouse to click on the menu buttons)

Right mouse button/left shoulder button: aim laser

Left mouse button/right shoulder button: shoot laser

WASD/Left stick: move

Made with unreal engine 5 for the 3 day darkness minijam

Assets used: Ultimate music pack
ultimate sfx pack 

from unreal marketplace
